articles.author: Scott Dance, Kasha Patel
articles.title: Four ways the Trump firings could affect weather forecasts - The Washington Post
articles.description: Current and former agency officials and lawmakers said the cuts could have major impacts on Americans and the economy, compromising important functions.
articles.content: At dozens of National Weather Services offices across the country, staffing levels were low well before President Donald Trump took office. As the new administration announced mass terminations this … [+9672 chars]
